testcase.name: DBA.FR59
testcase.description: D DBA.FR59: When the annual report contains an audit report, which is when TypeOfAuditorAssistance = Revisionspåtegning / Auditor's report on audited financial statements, then the concept arr:DescriptionOfQualificationsOfAuditedFinancialStatement must be filled in.

variation.name: Invalid
variation.description: TypeOfAuditorAssistance = Revisionspåtegning and DescriptionOfQualificationsOfAuditedFinancialStatement is not tagged.
